abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism to add origin authentication, message integrity, replay-resistance, message sequencing, and detection of missing messages to the transmitted syslog messages. This specification draws upon the work defined in RFC xxxx, "The syslog Protocol", however it may be used atop any message delivery mechanism, even that defined in RFC 3164, "The BSD syslog Protocol", or in the RAW mode of "RFC 3195, "The Reliable Delivery of syslog".
